Developer-First Approach

Build resume optimization into your applications with our comprehensive SDKs

Python SDK

Available Now

Complete Python library with full API coverage, async support, and comprehensive documentation.

pip install resume-ai-sdk

Node.js SDK

Coming Soon

TypeScript-first Node.js SDK with full IntelliSense support and modern async/await patterns.

npm install @resume-ai/sdk
